hero.title: DMS Mehedi
hero.subtitle: AI-Powered Developer • Digital Strategist • Creator
hero.description: Building the future of web with Next.js, Firebase, and AI integration. Specializing in digital marketing, web development, and automation.

about.title: About Me
about.description1: I'm a futuristic-minded developer and digital strategist with a passion for creating cutting-edge web experiences. With expertise in Next.js, Firebase, and AI integration, I build scalable solutions that push the boundaries of what's possible on the web.
about.description2: My journey spans digital marketing, web development, and automation. I believe in the power of AI to transform businesses and create meaningful digital experiences.
about.description3: When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new technologies, creating content, or strategizing the next big digital transformation.
about.innovationDesc: Pushing boundaries with cutting-edge technologies and creative solutions.
about.strategyDesc: Data-driven approach to digital marketing and business growth.
about.performanceDesc: Building fast, scalable, and responsive web applications.

services.title: Digital Services
services.digitalMarketingDesc: SEO optimization, funnel creation, and paid advertising strategies.
services.webDevelopmentDesc: Modern, scalable web applications built with Next.js and Firebase.
services.shopifyDesc: Automated e-commerce solutions with advanced automation and integrations.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: Have a project in mind? Let's collaborate and create something amazing together.
